DOC.brief_title: Text Message ( SMS ) Help Cancer Patients Chemotherapy Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator develop app ( call ChemotherApp ) Android automatically send text message homecare orientation cancer patient intervention group . The main feature app : register information name , number cellphone , gender , chemotherapy schedule patient . Other feature register orientation send patient text message . Daily , app send register orientation patient .
DOC.criteria: Cancer patient start chemotherapy treatment Hospital Escola Federal University Pelotas . Illiterate patient ; Patients cell phone
